attributes.action: Install CCTV For Area's at ALL Uk Cemeterys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Im the Mother who has endured not one lot of Vandalism but several, Items have been stolen off my sons Grave..As someone who has lost a child, to find there Graves in the state they get into because of Mindless People is even more heartbreaking! Our council have a seperate area for the childrens Area where Children under 3 are buried, This area is well kept by us the parents, All we ask is CCTV To protect our children who are no longer with us.. Its our duty, The council charge £350 for a plot to bury a child, And we are limited to small space, We want to keep that space Vandal Free and theft free.. Please Please we ask You take our feelings into consideration and let us have what we so need.. The police cant do anything so we are turning to you!
Thankyou

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
